title: A transformer-based framework for non-Cartesian MRI reconstruction
details: W Ji, Z Zhang, H Tan, W Yang, H Wang, X Liu, Q Wang - … International Conference on …, 2025
abstract: Non-Cartesian reconstruction is a crucial technique for accelerating MRI. However, traditional non-Cartesian reconstruction algorithms often result in suboptimal image quality. Recently, deep neural networks have emerged as powerful tools for MRI …
